channel.title: Chris Creegan on Transcripts of Iriss.fm

item.title: Learning Disability Week 2017
item.description: MM - Michael McEwan CC - Chris Creegan (Chief Executive - Scottish Commission for Learning Disabilities) MM We are going by Chris Creegan, now Chris Creegan is the Chief Executive of the Scottish Commission for Learning Disabilities. Thanks for talking to us. First off, what is happening this year? What's the theme? CC Okay so, just a little bit about the Scottish Commission for Learning Disability, and I'll explain what our role is and then talk to you about the theme for this year, yeah?
